Class PlanetSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • PlanetSystem

  • public class PlanetSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a planetary system with a hierarchical structure of nodes. The system includes a root node (e.g., a star) and its child nodes (e.g., planets and satellites).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlanetSystem()

      Adds a satellite to the planetary system under the specified parent node.

      Creates the root of the planetary system with the specified star and its sensor data.

      Recursively finds the path to the specified node.

      • PlanetSystem

        public PlanetSystem()

    • Method Detail

      • create_PlanetSystem

        public void create_PlanetSystem(java.lang.String star_name,
                                double temperature,
                                double pressure,
                                double humidity,
                                double radiation)
        Creates the root of the planetary system with the specified star and its sensor data.
        Parameters:
        star_name - The name of the star.
        temperature - The temperature of the star.
        pressure - The pressure of the star.
        humidity - The humidity of the star (must not be zero).
        radiation - The radiation level of the star.

      • addPlanet

        public void addPlanet(java.lang.String planet_name,
                      java.lang.String parent_name,
                      double temperature,
                      double pressure,
                      double humidity,
                      double radiation)
        Adds a planet to the planetary system under the specified parent node.
        Parameters:
        planet_name - The name of the planet.
        parent_name - The name of the parent node (e.g., the star or another planet).
        temperature - The temperature of the planet.
        pressure - The pressure of the planet.
        humidity - The humidity of the planet.
        radiation - The radiation level of the planet.

      • addSatellite

        public void addSatellite(java.lang.String satelitte_name,
                         java.lang.String parent_name,
                         double temperature,
                         double pressure,
                         double humidity,
                         double radiation)
        Adds a satellite to the planetary system under the specified parent node.
        Parameters:
        satellite_name - The name of the satellite.
        parent_name - The name of the parent node (e.g., a planet).
        temperature - The temperature of the satellite.
        pressure - The pressure of the satellite.
        humidity - The humidity of the satellite.
        radiation - The radiation level of the satellite.

      • findRadiationAnomalies

        public java.util.List<Node> findRadiationAnomalies(double threshold)
        Finds nodes in the planetary system with radiation levels above the specified threshold.
        Parameters:
        threshold - The radiation level threshold.
        Returns:
        A list of nodes with radiation levels above the threshold.

      • getPathTo

        public java.util.Stack<java.lang.String> getPathTo(java.lang.String planet_name)
        Gets the path from the root to the specified node in the planetary system.
        Parameters:
        planet_name - The name of the target node.
        Returns:
        A stack representing the path from the root to the target node.

      • findPath

        public boolean findPath(Node node,
                        java.lang.String planet_name,
                        java.util.Stack<java.lang.String> path)
        Recursively finds the path to the specified node.
        Parameters:
        node - The current node being checked.
        planet_name - The name of the target node.
        path - The stack representing the path.
        Returns:
        True if the path to the target node is found, false otherwise.

      • printMissionReport

        public void printMissionReport()
        Prints a mission report for the entire planetary system.

      • printNode

        public void printNode(Node node,
                      int level)
        Prints a detailed report for a specific node in the planetary system.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to print the report for.
        level - The current level in the hierarchy (for indentation).

      • printMissionReport

        public void printMissionReport(java.lang.String node_name)
        Prints a mission report for a specific node in the planetary system.
        Parameters:
        planet_name - The name of the node to print the report for.
